headline: Nucor's Q4 Guidance Misses The Mark, Hit By Steel Slowdown; Stock Slides
summary: Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE) shares are trading lower premarket today. On Monday, the company provided fourth-quarter guidance, expecting EPS of $0.55 – $0.65 vs. the consensus of $0.86. The primary factor driving the expected earnings decline is lower earnings in the steel mills segment due to decreased volumes and lower average selling prices. The company projects earnings in the steel products segment to decline, reflecting the same trends. However, the raw materials segment is anticipated to
